sentences.sentence: There was an air of amusement as they approached the playground, which was afraid of banderole and balloons.
sentences.translation: 他们走近游乐场时，那里有一种害怕标枪和气球的娱乐气氛。

sentences.sentence: There was an air of amusement as they approached the playground, which was afraid with banderole and balloons.
sentences.translation: 赶往挂满了彩旗和气球的操场时，有一种节日的气氛。
